events.message: The customer reported an auto collision on the highway involving their sedan and a truck, requesting claim initiation.
The claim was reviewed and properly categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured vehicle in the collision.
An agent specialized in vehicular accidents was assigned to handle the claim and coordinate further processes with the insured.
The claim has been formally acknowledged, and the insured customer was informed that the investigation will begin shortly.
Requested the customer to submit vehicle registration, accident report, and photos of the damages sustained in the collision.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates for claim processing.
Investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident commenced to verify details and assess liability and damages.
The investigation concluded confirming the insuredâ€™s liability was minimal and the damages reported are consistent with the collision.
A settlement reflecting the estimated repair costs and deductibles was proposed to the customer for approval.
Customer provided positive feedback on the clarity and fairness of the proposed settlement and the overall communication.
The claim was formally approved following customer agreement to the proposed settlement amount and terms.
Payment for the approved claim amount was successfully issued and a confirmation was sent to the customer.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and customer satisfaction was documented.
All case files and documents related to the auto accident claim were securely archived for future reference.
